parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the upper ball joints can cause loss of control, accidents, and damage to the vehicle, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Squeaking sound coming from the suspension

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of the wheel can cause loss of control, accidents, and damage to the vehicle, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
The failure of the front axle assembly can cause loss of control, accidents, and damage to the vehicle, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Violent shaking or vibration while driving
and loose or unbolted front axle assembly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle can shift out of gear without warning, causing unintended movement, loss of control, and increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle shifts out of gear when stopped
the vehicle moves in reverse without warning
the shift indicator shows the vehicle is in park
but the vehicle is still moving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear axle can cause loss of control, accidents, and serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The rear axle breaks while driving
the vehicle spins out of control
the vehicle drags the rear tire for a significant distance
the vehicle comes to a stop with difficulty.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Axle Shaft Failure Due to Incorrect Manufacturing
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the axle shaft can cause loss of control, accidents, and serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The axle shaft fails due to incorrect heat treatment
the splined end of the axle shaft breaks

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Flange Weld Failure on Axle Tube
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the flange weld on the axle tube can cause loss of control, accidents, and serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The flange weld on the axle tube fails

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or loss of vehicle control, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: Strange noise from the front end when turning the wheel
rust on front tie rod ends
failure of the steering gear and track bar

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause loss of braking ability, leading to accidents or loss of vehicle control, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: replacement of rotors and brake pads

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The omission of safety features can increase the risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: Lack of rear seat head restraints

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A broken valve spring can cause engine failure, leading to a loss of power and potentially leaving the driver stranded, which can increase the risk of accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Exhaust Fumes Leaking into Passenger Compartment
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Exhaust fumes leaking into the passenger compartment can cause health risks to occupants, including carbon monoxide poisoning, and can lead to accidents due to driver distraction or disorientation.
symptoms: Unusual odors or fumes inside the vehicle
or nausea while driving or riding in the vehicle
warning lights or messages on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of brake function can cause accidents, injuries, and property damage, as the vehicle may accelerate uncontrollably or lose control.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes all the way to the floor without having any effect on the brake

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Warped brake rotors can cause the vehicle to pull to one side when braking, leading to loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel pulls hard to the right or left when braking
the vehicle still stops but with reduced effectiveness
and the warped rotors need to be replaced.
